theory.brief: Unit 2 học về cuộc sống thành phố với 2 chủ điểm ngữ pháp: (1) So sánh kép (Double comparatives) dùng cấu trúc 'The + comparative..., the + comparative...' để diễn tả mối quan hệ tỷ lệ thuận giữa hai sự vật/hiện tượng, và (2) Phrasal verbs (cụm động từ) liên quan đến cuộc sống đô thị.
examples: The more crowded the city gets, the more congested the streets are. (Càng đông đúc, đường phố càng tắc nghẽn.)
The higher you climb, the colder it gets. (Càng leo cao, trời càng lạnh.)
We need to get around the city by metro. (Chúng ta cần đi vòng quanh thành phố bằng tàu điện ngầm.)
They carried out a survey about city life. (Họ thực hiện một cuộc khảo sát về cuộc sống thành phố.)

exercises.question: The more crowded the city is, __________ it becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the + comparative... (tính từ ngắn thêm -er)
hints: The + so sánh hơn..., the + so sánh hơn...

exercises.question: The __________ you study, the better your grades will be.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ ngắn: The harder..., the better...

exercises.question: The closer we get to the city center, __________ expensive things become.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ dài: the more expensive

exercises.question: The __________ pollution increases, the more health problems people have.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N, the more + N

exercises.question: The higher the building is, __________ view we have.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the + comparative...

exercises.question: We can __________ the city easily by metro.
exercises.explanation: Get around = đi vòng vòng, đi lại (trong thành phố)
hints: Phrasal verb nghĩa 'đi lại trong thành phố'

exercises.question: The researchers __________ a study about traffic congestion.
exercises.explanation: Carry out = thực hiện (một nghiên cứu, dự án)

exercises.question: Many people __________ the flu in winter.
exercises.explanation: Come down with = mắc bệnh

exercises.question: Teenagers often __________ with friends at shopping malls.
exercises.explanation: Hang out = đi chơi, đi ra ngoài với bạn bè
hints: Phrasal verb nghĩa 'đi chơi với bạn'

exercises.question: The city is trying to __________ noise pollution.
exercises.explanation: Cut down on = cắt giảm, giảm bớt

exercises.question: The __________ the traffic jam, the later we arrive.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ bất quy tắc: worse (so sánh hơn của bad)

exercises.question: The more modern the city becomes, __________ traditional values it loses.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more..., the more...

exercises.question: The __________ we live from downtown, the cheaper the rent is.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ bất quy tắc: far → farther

exercises.question: The __________ facilities a city has, the more liveable it becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The better... (good → better → best)

exercises.question: I often get __________ in traffic jams during rush hour.
exercises.explanation: Get stuck in = bị kẹt trong (tắc đường)
hints: Cụm từ cố định: get stuck in

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more crowded the city gets the more congested it becomes
acceptedAnswers: The more crowded the city gets the more congested it becomes
The more crowded the city gets, the more congested it becomes
The more crowded the city gets the more congested it becomes.
The more crowded the city gets, the more congested it becomes.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The higher you climb the colder it gets
acceptedAnswers: The higher you climb the colder it gets
The higher you climb, the colder it gets
The higher you climb the colder it gets.
The higher you climb, the colder it gets.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: We can get around the city by metro
acceptedAnswers: We can get around the city by metro
We can get around the city by metro.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: They carried out a survey about city life
acceptedAnswers: They carried out a survey about city life
They carried out a survey about city life.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: Teenagers hang out with friends at shopping malls
acceptedAnswers: Teenagers hang out with friends at shopping malls
Teenagers hang out with friends at shopping malls.

exercises.question: The __________ you practice, the more fluent you become.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + S + V, the + comparative...

exercises.question: The authorities are trying to __________ air pollution in the city.
exercises.explanation: Cut down on = cắt giảm (ô nhiễm, chi phí)

exercises.question: The nearer we get to the construction site, __________ it becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the + comparative...

exercises.question: The faster the city grows, __________ public amenities it needs.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The + comparative..., the more + N

exercises.question: The __________ the street, the safer it is for children.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ: quiet → quieter
hints: Tính từ 2 âm tiết kết thúc -et thêm -er

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The city is trying to cut down on noise pollution
acceptedAnswers: The city is trying to cut down on noise pollution
The city is trying to cut down on noise pollution.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: Many people came down with the flu last winter
acceptedAnswers: Many people came down with the flu last winter
Many people came down with the flu last winter.

exercises.question: The more expensive the area is, __________ people can afford to live there.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more..., the fewer... (với danh từ đếm được)

exercises.question: The later we leave, __________ traffic we'll encounter.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The later..., the more...

exercises.question: The __________ the metro system, the easier it is to get around.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với tính từ bất quy tắc: good → better

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more you practice the better you become
acceptedAnswers: The more you practice the better you become
The more you practice, the better you become
The more you practice the better you become.
The more you practice, the better you become.
hints: The more + S + V, the + comparative

exercises.question: The __________ you wake up, the more time you have for breakfast.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: early → earlier
hints: Tính từ 2 âm tiết kết thúc -y → -ier

exercises.question: The government plans to __________ new jobs in the city.
exercises.explanation: Set up = thành lập, tạo ra

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The busier the city gets the noisier it becomes
acceptedAnswers: The busier the city gets the noisier it becomes
The busier the city gets, the noisier it becomes
The busier the city gets the noisier it becomes.
The busier the city gets, the noisier it becomes.

exercises.question: The __________ people move to cities, the more infrastructure is needed.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với động từ: The more + S + V

exercises.question: She had to __________ the invitation because she was busy.
exercises.explanation: Turn down = từ chối

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The closer we get to downtown the more expensive it is
acceptedAnswers: The closer we get to downtown the more expensive it is
The closer we get to downtown, the more expensive it is
The closer we get to downtown the more expensive it is.
The closer we get to downtown, the more expensive it is.
hints: The + comparative..., the more + tính từ dài

exercises.question: The factory had to __________ due to financial problems.
exercises.explanation: Close down = đóng cửa vĩnh viễn

exercises.question: The __________ the building, the more spectacular the view.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: tall → taller

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The government needs to deal with traffic problems
acceptedAnswers: The government needs to deal with traffic problems
The government needs to deal with traffic problems.

exercises.question: The __________ mistakes you make, the lower your score will be.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với danh từ: The more + N

exercises.question: Let's __________ the new shopping mall this weekend.
exercises.explanation: Look around = ngắm nghía, xem xung quanh

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The fewer cars on the road the less pollution there is
acceptedAnswers: The fewer cars on the road the less pollution there is
The fewer cars on the road, the less pollution there is
The fewer cars on the road the less pollution there is.
The fewer cars on the road, the less pollution there is.
hints: The fewer + N, the less + N

exercises.question: The __________ it gets in winter, the higher the heating bills are.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: cold → colder

exercises.question: Many small businesses can't __________ such a low income.
exercises.explanation: Live on = sống nhờ vào

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more polluted the air becomes the more health issues arise
acceptedAnswers: The more polluted the air becomes the more health issues arise
The more polluted the air becomes, the more health issues arise
The more polluted the air becomes the more health issues arise.
The more polluted the air becomes, the more health issues arise.

exercises.question: The __________ the population grows, the more housing we need.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: fast → faster

exercises.question: The scientist will __________ important research next month.
exercises.explanation: Carry out = thực hiện (nghiên cứu)

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: I always get stuck in traffic during rush hour
acceptedAnswers: I always get stuck in traffic during rush hour
I always get stuck in traffic during rush hour.

exercises.question: The __________ the service, the more customers you attract.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: good → better

exercises.question: The __________ you live from the center, the cheaper the rent.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: far → farther

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The sooner we leave the earlier we will arrive
acceptedAnswers: The sooner we leave the earlier we will arrive
The sooner we leave, the earlier we will arrive
The sooner we leave the earlier we will arrive.
The sooner we leave, the earlier we will arrive.

exercises.question: The __________ children in a family, the more expenses parents have.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với danh từ: The more + N
hints: The more + danh từ đếm được

exercises.question: The __________ students study, the higher their test scores are.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: hard → harder

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more friends you have the happier you are
acceptedAnswers: The more friends you have the happier you are
The more friends you have, the happier you are
The more friends you have the happier you are.
The more friends you have, the happier you are.

exercises.question: The __________ public transportation, the less traffic congestion.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: good → better

exercises.question: The __________ the weather gets, the more people stay indoors.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: bad → worse

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The longer you wait the harder it becomes
acceptedAnswers: The longer you wait the harder it becomes
The longer you wait, the harder it becomes
The longer you wait the harder it becomes.
The longer you wait, the harder it becomes.

exercises.question: The __________ parking spaces, the bigger the parking problem.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: few → fewer (với danh từ đếm được)
hints: Few → fewer với danh từ đếm được

exercises.question: The __________ the city becomes, the more modern facilities it has.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: rich → richer

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more convenient the location the higher the price
acceptedAnswers: The more convenient the location the higher the price
The more convenient the location, the higher the price
The more convenient the location the higher the price.
The more convenient the location, the higher the price.
hints: The more + tính từ dài, the + comparative

exercises.question: The __________ time you spend on social media, the less productive you are.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép với danh từ: The more + time
hints: The more + danh từ không đếm được

exercises.question: The __________ the neighborhood, the safer residents feel.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: quiet → quieter

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The less noise pollution the better quality of life
acceptedAnswers: The less noise pollution the better quality of life
The less noise pollution, the better quality of life
The less noise pollution the better quality of life.
The less noise pollution, the better quality of life.
hints: The less + N, the better + N

exercises.question: The __________ shops in the area, the more shopping options you have.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.question: The __________ you get to know the city, the more you love it.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: well → better

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The wider the streets the easier traffic flows
acceptedAnswers: The wider the streets the easier traffic flows
The wider the streets, the easier traffic flows
The wider the streets the easier traffic flows.
The wider the streets, the easier traffic flows.

exercises.question: The __________ green spaces in the city, the fresher the air.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.question: The __________ developed the infrastructure, the more attractive the city is to investors.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: well developed → better developed

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more entertainment options the more tourists visit
acceptedAnswers: The more entertainment options the more tourists visit
The more entertainment options, the more tourists visit
The more entertainment options the more tourists visit.
The more entertainment options, the more tourists visit.
hints: The more + N, the more + N

exercises.question: The __________ the rush hour, the slower the traffic moves.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: busy → busier

exercises.question: The __________ restaurants there are, the more dining choices people have.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N
hints: The more + danh từ đếm được

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The cleaner the environment the healthier people are
acceptedAnswers: The cleaner the environment the healthier people are
The cleaner the environment, the healthier people are
The cleaner the environment the healthier people are.
The cleaner the environment, the healthier people are.

exercises.question: The __________ job opportunities, the more people migrate to the city.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.question: The __________ educated the workforce, the more competitive the economy.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: well educated → better educated

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The safer the city the more families want to live there
acceptedAnswers: The safer the city the more families want to live there
The safer the city, the more families want to live there
The safer the city the more families want to live there.
The safer the city, the more families want to live there.

exercises.question: The __________ the city expands, the more land is needed.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: fast → faster

exercises.question: The __________ crime rate, the less safe people feel.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: high → higher

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more modern the hospital the better healthcare services
acceptedAnswers: The more modern the hospital the better healthcare services
The more modern the hospital, the better healthcare services
The more modern the hospital the better healthcare services.
The more modern the hospital, the better healthcare services.
hints: The more + tính từ dài, the better + N

exercises.question: The __________ planning, the smoother the project runs.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: good → better

exercises.question: The __________ public parks, the greener the city becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The smaller the apartment the cheaper the rent
acceptedAnswers: The smaller the apartment the cheaper the rent
The smaller the apartment, the cheaper the rent
The smaller the apartment the cheaper the rent.
The smaller the apartment, the cheaper the rent.

exercises.question: The __________ the city invests in education, the smarter the future workforce.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + S + V

exercises.question: The __________ construction projects, the noisier the city gets.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The nearer the school the more convenient for students
acceptedAnswers: The nearer the school the more convenient for students
The nearer the school, the more convenient for students
The nearer the school the more convenient for students.
The nearer the school, the more convenient for students.
hints: Near → nearer, the more + tính từ dài

exercises.question: The __________ factories operate, the worse the air quality becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.question: The __________ connected the city, the easier people can travel.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: well connected → better connected

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The older the buildings the more maintenance they need
acceptedAnswers: The older the buildings the more maintenance they need
The older the buildings, the more maintenance they need
The older the buildings the more maintenance they need.
The older the buildings, the more maintenance they need.
hints: Old → older, the more + danh từ

exercises.question: The __________ bike lanes, the safer cycling becomes.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.question: The __________ diverse the community, the richer the cultural experience.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + tính từ dài

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The stronger the economy the better living standards
acceptedAnswers: The stronger the economy the better living standards
The stronger the economy, the better living standards
The stronger the economy the better living standards.
The stronger the economy, the better living standards.

exercises.question: The __________ street lights, the darker and more dangerous the area.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: few → fewer (với danh từ đếm được)

exercises.question: The __________ you wait to buy tickets, the more expensive they become.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: long → longer

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more accessible public transport the fewer private cars
acceptedAnswers: The more accessible public transport the fewer private cars
The more accessible public transport, the fewer private cars
The more accessible public transport the fewer private cars.
The more accessible public transport, the fewer private cars.
hints: The more + tính từ dài, the fewer + N

exercises.question: The __________ weather conditions, the more delays in transportation.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: bad → worse

exercises.question: The __________ recycling programs, the less waste goes to landfills.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The brighter the lights the easier it is to see
acceptedAnswers: The brighter the lights the easier it is to see
The brighter the lights, the easier it is to see
The brighter the lights the easier it is to see.
The brighter the lights, the easier it is to see.

exercises.question: The __________ schools in the area, the more educational opportunities.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: The more + N

exercises.question: The __________ prepared you are, the less stressed you feel.
exercises.explanation: So sánh kép: well prepared → better prepared

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The more you explore the city the more you discover
acceptedAnswers: The more you explore the city the more you discover
The more you explore the city, the more you discover
The more you explore the city the more you discover.
The more you explore the city, the more you discover.
hints: The more + S + V, the more + S + V
